title: Cute or Crazy
overview: Park Kyung Rim is an art gallery curator, who lives with her older brother Seung Soo, an English teacher, and her friend So Yoo Jin. Kyung Rim works for Kim Soo Mi, who co-owns the gallery with her husband, Chairman Kim. The Kims have three sons, the youngest of whom, Min Hyuk, is a troublemaker and gadabout. Park Shin Hye is a young student at Seung Soo's English school.
